text: Derevnya Geofizikov () is a rural locality (a village) in Chesnokovsky Selsoviet, Ufimsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 509 as of 2010. There are 5 streets. == Geography == It is located 19 km from Ufa, 7 km from Chesnokovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Ufimsky District
title: Derevnya Geofizikov
